testsuite.name: login.To test flight application login screen.

testcase.name: Validate with valid credential
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Validate with valid credential Given open the url "http://newtours.demoaut.com/" ... passed in 1.959s Then validate landing page "Welcome: Mercury Tours" ... passed in 0.016s When login with username "mercury" and password "mercury" ... passed in 16.080s Then validate landing page "Find a Flight: Mercury Tours:" ... passed in 0.013s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
